Articles.Content:
What about a house on a small island somewhere on kerbin as a fantasy island reference. Maybe a small kerbal(or two? One taller.) comes out and greets you. 8) Or comes out to look at your plane flying by. Or other references that either of the main actors of that show were in.

Edited October 18, 2016 by Arugela
I think many people here may be too young to remember that show. Heck, I'm 33 and too young to remember that show.
